name: Worland: Dungeons
description:
In Worland, you need to be the strongest.

Explore
There are several worlds, and they are very dangerous.


Grow Plants
You can find seeds, and plant in boxes. If a plant is ready, you can harvest it.


Gathering
Find deposits, bushes, and trees to gather resources.


Animals
In forests, and fields you will meet with animals too. If you are good enough, attack them to get their loots.


Boss Fights
In dungeons, arenas, you will fight against strong creatures. They have special spells that you have to avoid.


FROM A SOLO DEVELOPER
Strange worlds from one mind.
